owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Kostas Tsatsakis (kostas@suite5.eu)
Spiros Kousouris (spiros@suite5.eu)
owl:Ontology.terms:abstract: An ontology for energy services, defined as an extension of SAREF to address lifecycle assessment parameters for the energy systems.
owl:Ontology.terms:description: An ontology for energy services, defined as an extension of SAREF to address lifecycle assessment (LCA) parameters for the energy systems, especially needed in renovation projects.
owl:Ontology.terms:title: Digital Construction - EnergySystems
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: The IAQ ontology was created by SUITE5 in the BIM4EEB project (GA 820660), supported through the EU Horizon 2020 Research and Innovation Programme under the topic Building information modelling adapted to efficient renovation (RIA).
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Digital Construction Energy Systems

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: the device/ energy system is associated with an operational cost
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Cost

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: An energy system has some typical energy statistics
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Energy Statistics

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: relationship of a device and its LCA
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Lifecycle Parameters

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: The eneryg system has some power statistics
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Power Statistics

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A service of the energy system is associated with a reward for this service
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has Reward

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A service of an energy system has as a reference an baseline profile
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: refers To

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Thermal discomfort, measured as a number of hours when the temperature is above 27 degrees celsius
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: annualHoursOfThermalDiscomfort

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The total duration of the process
The amount of Emissions in LCA analysis
The end time of a process|
The max value for the energy (daily) profile of an energy system
The min value for the energy (daily) profile of an energy system
The max value for the power profile of an energy system
The min value for the power profile of an energy system
Power Standard deviation of a device
Power Skewness of a device power profile
The start time of a process|
Annual cooling energy consumption of a building, in kWh/m2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: normalizedCoolingEnergyConsumption

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Annual electricity consumption of a building, in kWh/m2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: normalizedElectricityConsumption

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Annual heating energy consumption of a building, in kWh/m2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: normalizedHeatingEnergyConsumption

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Investment costs of a renovation project as $/floor-m2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: normalizedInvestmentCost

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Annual operational energy cost of a building in €/floor-m2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: normalizedOperationalEnergyCosts

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Annual primary energy consumption of a building, in kWhpr/m2
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: normalizedPrimaryEnergyConsumption

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: The share of renewable energy supply, in percentages
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: renewableEnergySupplyShare

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Payback time of a RenovationProject, in years
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: renovationPaybackTime

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Independent from the ActuatorSwitch class, the ActuatorLevel class enables a user or application to model LEVEL commands (start, up, percentageAbsolute, relative, etc.). This can be used to dim a light, set the speed of an electric motor, etc.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Actuator Level

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Annual cooling energy consumption of a building, in kWh/m2
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnnualCoolingEnergyConsumptionPerArea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Annual electricity consumption of a building, in kWh/m2
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnnualElectricityConsumptionPerArea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Annual heating energy consumption of a building, in kWh/m2
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnnualHeatingEnergyConsumptionPerArea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Annual operational energy costs in €/floor-m2
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnnualOperationalCostPerArea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Annual primary energy consumption of a building, in kWh/m2
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnnualPrimaryEnergyConsumptionPerArea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Number of hours that the temperature of the bearer is above 27 degrees celsius
owl:Class.rdfs:label: AnnualThermalDiscomfortHours

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Along wiht the actual profile, the baseline profile of each device should be defined for the participation in energy services
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Baseline Profile

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Residential, behind the meter battery system
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Battery Storage

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Small CHPs for local generation
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Combined Heat & Power

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The capital cost required for the investment on Energy Systems
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Capital Cost

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An automation service offered to the users on the way to ensure comfort preservation
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Comfort Preservation

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Installation of the energy system
Transport of Energy System to the destination
Construction phase of renovation
The deconstruction of Energy System
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Deconstruction process

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Small Diesel Generator for back up
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Diesel Generator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Charging points and the associated EVs
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Electric Vehicles

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: End of life period for the Energy System
owl:Class.rdfs:label: End of Life

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Engineering and operation cost for the device
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Engineering Cost

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Energy System Flexibility
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Flexibility

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Heating Cooling and Ventilation systems
owl:Class.rdfs:label: HVAC Systems

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The investment in €/floor-m2
owl:Class.rdfs:label: InvestmentCostPerArea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Device Lifecycle class to represent the different properties that have to be considered in the model for the project
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Device Lifecycle

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Lifecycle Cost Parameters for the Energy Systems
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Lifecycle Cost

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Maintenance Costs for the Energy System
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Maintenance Cost

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Manufacturing stage for the Energy System
Material Supply for the early stage of r the Energy System
Actual Operation of the energy system
The operational costs for the Energy System
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operational Costs

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Small scale Photovoltaics
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rooftop PVs

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Production phase for the Energy System
The percentage of energy consumption that comes from renewable energy sources
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RenewableEnergySupplyShare

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The number of years it takes to pay back the costs of renovation, that is, the time the savings equal to the investment
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RenovationPaybackTime

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A Scenario - a description and analysis of a potential future of an entity - where that entity is a Location (a building or a building zone) that is subject to a set of RenovationMeasures (activities to dismantel, modify, or replace existing structure or to install additional structures), and the characteristics of implied by the application of those Measures.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: RenovationScenario

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: LCA analysis during the repair phase
LCA analysis during the replacement phase
This is the reward from participating in innovative Energy Services (like DR)
This is the service about self consumption optimization.. Balancing local generation with demand
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Self Consumption Optimization

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This is the load control from 3rd party aggregators to enable participation in DR markets (services to DSOs, anchillary services etc...)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Service to Aggregator

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Generic energy and power statistics that characterize the daily curve of each eneryg related device
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Energy Statistics

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Operational Phase of the Energy System
LCA analysis during the maintenance period
Special process required for the management of disposals
Wind Turbines (small scale)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Wind Turbine
